Code: EXEC SQL SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SEGUROS.SINISTRO_HISTORICO T1, SEGUROS.OUTRA_TABELA T2 WHERE T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND T1.OCORR_HISTORICO = :OCORR_HISTORICO AND T1.COD_OPERACAO = T2.COD_OPERACAO AND T2.IDE_SISTEMA = 'SI' AND T2.COD_FUNCAO IN (2, 5, 6, 8, 12, 15, 16, 21, 22) AND T2.IDE_SISTEMA_OPER = T2.IDE_SISTEMA AND T2.NUM_FATOR = -1 END SQL
